userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Indenture to James Griffin, 1742 Mar 2, Manuscript # 1987.1, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Clayton, son of Thomas Clayton, dec., and Ann {Clayton} Hunt, all of Richmond County {Va.}, apprentices himself to James Griffin, joiner, for the term of five years, beginning 9 October 1745. Endorsed by M. Beckwith, Clerk of the Court for Richmond County.
